Verses: 1 eliyaa Seydha Ellaavatraiyum, Avan Theerkkadharisigalellaaraiyum Pattayaththaale Kondrupotta Seydhi Anaiththaiyum, Aagaab Yesabelukku Ariviththaan.

2 appozhudhu Yesabel Eliyaavinidaththil Aal Anuppi: Avargalil Ovvoruvanudaiya Praananukku Seyyappattadhupola, Naan Naalai Inneraththil Un Praananukku Seyyaadheponaal, Dhevargal Adharku Sariyaagavum Adharku Adhigamaagavum Enakku Seyyakkadavargal Endru Sollachchonnaal.
3 avanukku Adhu Therindhapodhu Ezhundhu, Than Praananaik Kaakka Yoodhaavaichcherndha Peyersebaavukkup Purappattuppoi, Than Velaikkaaranai Ange Niruththivittaan.

4 avan Vanaandharaththil Orunaal Prayaanam Poi, Oru Sooraichchediyin Keezh Utkaarndhu, Thaan Saagavendum Endru Kori: Podhum Karththaave, En Aaththumaavai Eduththukkollum; Naan En Pidhaakkalaippaarkkilum Nallavan Alla Endru Solli,
5 oru Sooraichchediyinkeezhp Paduththukkondu Niththiraipanninaan; Appozhudhu Oru Thoodhan Avanaith Thattiyezhuppi: Ezhundhirundhu Pojanam Pannu Endraan.

6 avan Vizhiththup Paarkkirapodhu, Idho, Thazhalil Sudappatta Adaiyum, Oru Paaththiraththil Thanneerum Avan Thalaimaattil Irundhadhu; Appozhudhu Avan, Pusiththuk Kudiththuth Thirumbap Paduththukkondaan.
7 karththarudaiya Thoodhan Thirumba Irandaandharam Vandhu Avanaith Thattiyezhuppi: Ezhundhirundhu Pojanampannu; Nee Pannavendiya Prayaanam Vegudhooram Endraan.
8 appozhudhu Avan Ezhundhirundhu Pusiththuk Kudiththu, Andhap Pojanaththin Balaththinaal Naarpadhunaal Iravupagal Orep Ennum Dhevanudaiya Parvadhamattum Nadandhuponaan.
9 ange Avan Oru Kebikkul Poith Thanginaan; Idho, Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Avanukku Undaagi, Avar: Eliyaave, Inge Unakku Enna Kaariyam Endraar.

10 adharku Avan: Senaigalin Dhevanaagiya Karththarukkaaga Vegu Bakthivairaakkiyamaayirundhen; Isravel Puththirar Umadhu Udanpadikkaiyaith Thallivittaargal; Ummudaiya Palipeedangalai Idiththu, Ummudaiya Theerkkadharisigalaip Pattayaththinaal Kondrupottaargal; Naan Oruvanmaaththiram Meedhiyaayirukkiren; En Praananaiyum Vaangath Thedugiraargal Endraan.

11 appozhudhu Avar: Nee Veliye Vandhu Karththarukku Munbaagap Parvadhaththil Nil Endraar; Appozhudhu, Idho, Karththar Kadandhuponaar; Karththarukku Munbaagap Parvadhangalaip Pilakkiradhum Kanmalaigalai Udaikkiradhumaana Balaththa Perungaatru Undaayitru; Aanaalum Andhak Kaatrile Karththar Irukkavillai; Kaatrirkuppin Boomi Adhirchchi Undaayitru; Boomi Adhirchchiyilum Karththar Irukkavillai.
12 boomi Adhirchchikkuppin Akkini Undaayitru; Akkiniyilum Karththar Irukkavillai; Akkinikkuppin Amarndha Melliyasaththam Undaayitru.

13 adhai Eliyaa Kettapodhu, Than Saalvaiyinaal Than Mugaththai Moodikkondu Veliye Vandhu, Kebiyin Vaasalil Nindraan. Appozhudhu, Idho, Eliyaave, Inge Unakku Enna Kaariyam Engira Saththam Avanukku Undaayitru.

14 adharku Avan: Senaigalin Dhevanaagiya Karththarukkaaga Vegu Bakthivairaakkiyamaayirundhen; Isravel Puththirar Umadhu Udanpadikkaiyaith Thallivittaargal; Ummudaiya Palipeedangalai Idiththu, Ummudaiya Theerkkadharisigalaip Pattayaththinaal Kondrupottaargal, Naan Oruvanmaaththiram Meedhiyaayirukkiren; En Praananaiyum Vaangath Thedugiraargal Endraan.
15 appozhudhu Karththar Avanaip Paarththu: Nee Thamaskuvin Vazhiyaai Vanaandharaththirkuth Thirumbip Poi, Aasagelai Seeriyaavinmel Raajaavaaga Abishegam Panni,

16 pinbu Nimsiyin Kumaaranaagiya Yegoovai Isravelinmel Raajaavaaga Abishegampanni, Aabelmekolaa Ooraanaana Saappaaththin Kumaaranaagiya Elisaavai Un Sthaanaththile Theerkkadharisiyaaga Abishegampannu.
17 sambavippadhaavadhu: Aasagelin Pattayaththirkuth Thappinavanai Yegoo Kondrupoduvaan; Yegoovin Pattayaththirkuth Thappinavanai Elisaa Kondru Poduvaan.
18 aanaalum Paagaalukku Mudangaadhirukkira Muzhangaalgalaiyum, Avanai Muththancheyyaadhirukkira Vaaigalaiyumudaiya Ezhaayiramperai Isravelile Meedhiyaaga Vaiththirukkiren Endraar.

19 appadiye Avan Avvidam Vittu Purappattuppoi, Pannirandu Erpootti Uzhudha Saappaaththin Kumaaranaagiya Elisaavaik Kandaan; Avan Pannirandaam Erai Ottikkondirundhaan; Eliyaa Avan Irukkum Idamattum Poi, Avanmel Than Saalvaiyaip Pottaan.

20 appozhudhu Avan Maadugalai Vittu, Eliyaavin Pirage Odi: Naan En Thagappanaiyum En Thaayaiyum Muththancheyya Uththaravukodum, Adharkuppin Ummaip Pinthodarven Endraan. Adharku Avan: Poith Thirumbivaa; Naan Unakku Seydhadhai Ninaiththuk Kol Endraan.

21 appozhudhu Avan Ivanai Vittup Poi, Or Ermaadugalaip Pidiththu Adiththu, Erin Maramuttugalaal Avaigalin Iraichchiyai Samaiththu Janangalukkuk Koduththaan; Avargal Saappittapirpaadu, Avan Ezhundhu, Eliyaavukkup Pinsendru Avanukku Oozhiyancheydhaan.
